unauthorized: Dear users, to preserve your privacy, you must login before you can view personal details
listingSuccessfullyAddedToast: Listing was successfully added. Thank You!
rentModalCapacitySubtitle: Number of guests you can host
rentModalBedroomSubtitle: Number of available rooms for hosting?
title: Title
listingSecurityMessage: For security reasons, please do not specify your exact address in the listing. The information will be passed on to the guest during the first contact between the host and the potential guest.
loginModalBody: Login is only allowed via Google for security reasons.
homeBannerPreLoginText:
In these difficult times, many people from the areas affected by the attack on Israel need a safe place to stay.
SAFEbnb is a platform established to help connect residents who need a safe place to stay with residents who want to help and host.
homeBannerHostPostLoginText:
First and foremost, we want to commend you for opening your heart and home.
To ensure that the hosting will be suitable for both parties, please select options that are appropriate for the hosting place.
homeBannerGuestPostLoginText:
We hope we can help you with finding a safe place for you to stay as soon as possible.
To find a place that fits your needs, please use the search and filter options at the top of the page.
propertiesEmptySubtitle: Looks like you haven't published a listing yet
tripsEmptyStateSubtitle: Looks like you haven't made a reservation yet.
reservationEmptyStateSubtitle: Looks like there are no reservation requests for you yet.
